entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Baie-Comeau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:21 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -8.4°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning. Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets beginning this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Freezing rain or snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to snow after midnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
